channel.title: Explain runecrafting rep++
channel.description: I have never runecrafted before on runescape, and I guess this is the right section. How does runecrafting exactly work? I know you need a talisman/tiara, but what are their uses? If you know where the ruins are whats the point of having a talisman or tiara? And how is a tiara better?

item.title: Explain runecrafting rep++
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

FYI, i have like 82 rc on actuall runescape, I know my way around the runecrafting scenario, He wanted to know how it works so i explained it.

Read full topic

item.title: Explain runecrafting rep++
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:3, topic:422892”]Okay, so if you DONT have a tiara/talisman and you go to the ruins it won’t let you in?[/quote]I’m assuming you didn’t use a google search because you want the runecrafting mechanics from the old days.
http://web.archive.org/web/20060411074657/http://www.tip.it/runescape/?page=runecrafting_guide.htm
So there’s a old rc guide.

Read full topic

item.title: Explain runecrafting rep++
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

To get in you have to wear the tiara and then when you click it has an enter option, Otherwise you could use a talisman on them, Unless you’re wearing the tiara the “enter” option is not on the ruins.

Read full topic

item.title: Explain runecrafting rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Okay, so if you DONT have a tiara/talisman and you go to the ruins it won’t let you in?

Read full topic

item.title: Explain runecrafting rep++
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Tasimasn is used for locating/Entering the ruins, Although if you know where teh ruins is, you can wear a tiara, allowing you too not require the talisman to enter the ruins meaning you can have 1 extra essence per inventory making this actually better seeing as runecrafting takes FUCK LONG

If you need any more info just tell meh

Read full topic
